backend/main.mo: Motoko actor storing contact submissions with size limits and per‑principal rate limiting, exposing query to list and method to submit.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence descriptor detailing requirements for adding and correctly referencing a specific WhatsApp image asset.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries for all frontend files, describing component roles, config usage, and asset details.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme configuration defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode values, and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document setting meta tags and loading the React app root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app composing all sections, updating SEO meta tags, and passing config-driven props.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component showing branding, quick links, and attribution with smooth scrolling and external link support.
frontend/src/components/sections/Arduino: Displays an Arduino code snippet with dynamic temperature threshold and provides copy-to-clipboard functionality.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Implements a contact form with validation, submission handling, and user feedback states.
frontend/src/components/sections/DemoMed: Renders demo videos and images with error handling, or a placeholder when no media is available.
frontend/src/components/sections/Feature: Shows a grid of feature cards along with a banner image.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Displays the project hero area with title, tagline, background visuals, and CTA buttons.
frontend/src/components/sections/ManualS: Provides a user manual with required components and wiring instructions, using cards and structured lists.
frontend/src/components/sections/Overvie: Shows a simple project overview text section.
frontend/src/components/sections/Practic: Renders a grid of application cards and a hysteresis note with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/sections/TechSta: Displays a list of tech stack badges in a styled section.
frontend/src/components/sections/Thresho: Simulates temperature changes and shows motor status with interactive UI elements.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Responsive top navigation with scroll‑aware styling, smooth section navigation, and mobile menu handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches backend actors based on identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Fetches all contacts using the current backend actor and updates the cached actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitContact.ts: Handles contact form submission with loading, success, and error states.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom color themes with animation utilities.
frontend/src/lib/backendClient.ts: Stores a cached backend actor and exposes helpers to submit and fetch contacts.
frontend/src/lib/resolveAppUrl.ts: Resolves relative asset paths to full URLs based on the app’s base URL.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query and identity providers.
frontend/src/siteConfig.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for site configuration and exports a full configuration object describing project info, features, applications, media, and SEO settings.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugins including container queries and animate.
project_state.json: Stores the project's scaffold state, features, issues, and generated assets metadata for build and fix tracking.
